statements: SELECT * FROM components;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT component_name FROM components WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_id, quantity FROM components WHERE component_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE quantity BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT component_name FROM components WHERE component_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT component_id, component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE component_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tires LIMIT 10;
SELECT tire_name, quantity FROM tires WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT tire_name, quantity FROM tires WHERE tire_name LIKE 'Michelin%';
SELECT * FROM components WHERE component_name IN ('Engine', 'Suspension', 'Brakes');
SELECT * FROM tires WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY tire_name ASC
SELECT tire_name, quantity FROM tires WHERE tire_id = 1
SELECT * FROM components WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY component_name DESC
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE component_id = 2
SELECT * FROM tires JOIN components ON tires.quantity = components.quantity
SELECT * FROM tires
SELECT brand, size FROM tires WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT id, brand, size FROM tires ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT * FROM chains WHERE material = 'Steel'
SELECT id, material, quantity FROM chains ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT brand, size FROM tires WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT material, length FROM chains WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY length DESC
SELECT type, color FROM pedals WHERE quantity = 0 AND type = 'Mountain'
SELECT * FROM tires JOIN chains ON tires.size = chains.material WHERE tires.quantity >= chains.quantity
SELECT brand, quantity FROM tires UNION SELECT type, quantity FROM pedals
SELECT * FROM tires;
SELECT brand, size FROM tires WHERE size > 16;
SELECT brand, quantity FROM chains WHERE material = 'steel';
SELECT color, quantity FROM pedals ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE component_type = 'tires';
SELECT * FROM tires WHERE size > 15 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, quantity FROM pedals WHERE color = 'red' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_id, component_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE component_type = 'tires' OR component_type = 'pedals';
SELECT * FROM chains WHERE material = 'steel' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, brand ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_chains FROM chains;
SELECT * FROM tires;
SELECT tire_name, tire_brand FROM tires ORDER BY tire_name ASC;
SELECT tire_name, tire_stock FROM tires WHERE tire_stock > 0;
SELECT tire_name, tire_brand, tire_stock FROM tires WHERE tire_brand = 'Michelin';
SELECT * FROM chains WHERE chain_stock < 10 ORDER BY chain_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM pedals WHERE pedal_color = 'Red' ORDER BY pedal_stock DESC, pedal_name ASC;
SELECT tire_name, tire_brand, tire_stock FROM tires WHERE tire_brand = 'Michelin';
SELECT chain_name, chain_length FROM chains WHERE chain_stock > 10 ORDER BY chain_length DESC;
SELECT frame_name, frame_material, frame_stock FROM frames WHERE frame_material = 'Carbon Fiber';
SELECT * FROM seats WHERE seat_stock < 50 ORDER BY seat_name ASC, seat_type DESC;
